bibl.title: Reading and Reconstruction: A Fragment of Old Comedy from Oxyrhynchus. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Lecture presented at "The Archimedes Palimpsest Colloquium" held at the Eötvös Collegium, Budapest, 18-22 September 2007. - Fragment of Old Comedy, second / third century. - Abridged from a forthcoming publication in The Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
HANDLEY Eric W., Reading and Reconstruction: A Fragment of Old Comedy from Oxyrhynchus. Avec résumé en anglais.
